item.title: Git Workshop 1 - Intro to Git with Github and Codeberg (Instructions)
item.description:
Version control essentials.

From clone to commits, we’ll cover collaborative development workflows. Non-Programmers are also encouraged to join :D

[!TIP] Carry your laptops!
